mapper.select: select mid,mname,m.mtid,mtname,attr from menuitem m join menutype mt on m.mtid=mt.mtid
select * from (select mid,mname,m.mtid,mtname,attr from menuitem m join menutype mt on m.mtid=mt.mtid) a , sysright sr where a.mid=sr.mid and sr.sid=${sid}
select * from (select rownum rn ,a.* from (select m.*,mtname from menuitem m,menutype mt where m.mtid=mt.mtid) a where ${pageNo}*${pageSize} >= rownum ) where rn> (${pageNo}-1) * ${pageSize}
